food.question: I am yellow and long. Monkeys love to peel and eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I'm a favorite food of a jungle animal.
💛 I have a peel you throw away.
🌱 I grow on trees.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me with cereal. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 Baby animals drink me.
🐄 I come from an animal with spots.
🥣 I make a great combination with cookies.

food.question: I am round and red, and often sliced on burgers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I grow on a vine.
🍔 You can find me on sandwiches and salads.
🔴 I am often red, but can be other colors.

food.question: I am a grain that is often cooked and served in a bowl. What am I?

hints.text: 🍚 Many different cultures eat me.
🌾 I grow in fields.
💧 I need a lot of water to grow.

food.question: I am a sweet treat made from frozen cream and sugar. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I come in many flavors, like chocolate and vanilla.
🥶 I am very cold.
🍨 I am often eaten in a cone or a cup.

food.question: I am a vegetable that looks like a small tree. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 My color is usually green.
🥗 I am healthy and good for you.
🥦 I am part of the cabbage family.

food.question: I am made of dough and filled with sauce, cheese, and toppings, then baked. What am I?

hints.text: 🇮🇹 I'm a popular dish that originated in Italy.
🍕 You can order me for delivery.
✨ My slices are often triangular.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy skin and a juicy green inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 My name is also the name of a bird.
🌿 I have a slightly tangy taste.
🟤 My skin is brown and fuzzy.

food.question: I am a spicy sauce made from chili peppers, vinegar, and garlic. What am I?

hints.text: 🌶️ I can make your mouth feel hot!
🥫 I am often used in Asian cuisine.
🔥 A little goes a long way with me.

food.question: I am a type of mushroom prized for my strong, earthy aroma and flavor. What am I?

hints.text: 🍄 Pigs and dogs are sometimes used to find me.
🌍 I grow underground near tree roots.
👨‍🍳 Chefs use me to add depth to dishes.

cosmos.question: I shine bright at night, but I'm not the moon. I twinkle way up high, what could I be?

hints.text: ✨ I am very, very far away.
🔥 I make my own light.
🌃 You can see many of me in the night sky.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of rock that goes around the Sun. You live on me!

hints.text: 💧 I have lots of water.
🌎 I am part of the solar system.
🌱 Plants and animals live on me.

cosmos.question: I am Earth's best friend in the night sky. I have phases, sometimes full, sometimes just a sliver.

hints.text: 🧀 People sometimes say I am made of this.
🌕 Werewolves like me when I am full.
💫 I reflect light from the sun.

cosmos.question: I am the center of our solar system. Planets orbit around me.

hints.text: 🔥 I am a giant ball of hot gas.
☀️ I give Earth light and warmth.
😎 Looking directly at me is bad for your eyes.

cosmos.question: I am a cold and rocky world, known as the 'Red Planet'.

hints.text: 🍫 I am the color of some chocolate.
🚀 People are planning to visit me someday.
🌌 I am a planet.

cosmos.question: I'm the biggest planet in our solar system, with a famous red spot.

hints.text: 🌀 My red spot is a giant storm.
💨 I'm made mostly of gas.
🪐 I have many moons.

cosmos.question: I am a planet famous for my beautiful rings.

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice and rock.
🪐 I am a gas giant.
🔭 You can see my rings with a telescope.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that form a picture in the sky. Like a big bear!

hints.text: 🌠 I can help you find your way at night.
🐻 Ursa Major is a type of me.
🌌 People have told stories about me for centuries.

cosmos.question: I am a huge collection of stars, gas, and dust, and our solar system is part of me.

hints.text: ✨ I have a spiral shape.
🌌 Our Sun is just one of billions of stars in me.
🥛 My name sounds like something you drink.

cosmos.question: I am a chunk of rock and ice that flies through space, leaving a bright tail as I get close to the sun.

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of frozen gases.
☄️ My tail always points away from the sun.
💫 Some people think I am a dirty snowball.
